fees charged on this bAsset"},"returns":{"index":"               Position of the bAsset in the Basket"}},"collectInterest()":{"details":"Called by mAsset to calculate how much interest has been generated in the basket      and withdraw it. Cycles through the connected platforms to check the balances.","returns":{"gains":"              Array of bAsset units gained","interestCollected":"  Total amount of interest collected, in mAsset terms"}},"decreaseVaultBalance(uint8,address,uint256)":{"details":"Called by mAsset after redeeming tokens. Simply reduce the balance in the vault","params":{"_bAssetIndex":"Index of the bAsset","_decreaseAmount":"Units withdrawn"}},"decreaseVaultBalances(uint8[],address[],uint256[])":{"details":"Called by mAsset after redeeming tokens. Simply reduce the balance in the vault","params":{"_bAssetIndices":"Array of bAsset indexes","_decreaseAmount":"Units withdrawn"}},"failBasset(address)":{"details":"Marks a bAsset as permanently deviated from peg","params":{"_bAsset":"Address of the bAsset"}},"getBasket()":{"details":"Get basket details for `MassetStructs.Basket`","returns":{"b":"  Basket struct"}},"getBasset(address)":{"details":"Get data for a specific bAsset, if it exists","params":{"_bAsset":"Address of bAsset"},"returns":{"bAsset":" Struct with full bAsset data"}},"getBassetIntegrator(address)":{"details":"Get current integrator for a specific bAsset, if it exists","params":{"_bAsset":"Address of bAsset"},"returns":{"integrator":" Address of current integrator"}},"getBassets()":{"details":"Get data for a all bAssets in basket","returns":{"bAssets":" Struct[] with full bAsset data","len":"     Number of bAssets in the Basket"}},"handlePegLoss(address,bool)":{"details":"Executes the Auto Redistribution event by isolating the bAsset from the Basket","params":{"_bAsset":"Address of the ERC20 token to isolate","_belowPeg":"Bool to describe whether the bAsset deviated below peg (t)                         or above (f)"},"returns":{"alreadyActioned":"Bool to show whether a bAsset had already been actioned"}},"increaseVaultBalance(uint8,address,uint256)":{"details":"Called by only mAsset, and only when the basket is healthy, to add units to      storage after they have been deposited into the vault","params":{"_bAssetIndex":"Index of the bAsset","_increaseAmount":"Units deposited"}},"increaseVaultBalances(uint8[],address[],uint256[])":{"details":"Called by only mAsset, and only when the basket is healthy, to add units to      storage after they have been deposited into the vault","params":{"_bAssetIndices":"Array of bAsset indexes","_increaseAmount":"Units deposited"}},"initialize(address,address[],address[],uint256[],bool[])":{"details":"Initialization function for upgradable proxy contract.      This function should be called via Proxy just after contract deployment.","params":{"_bAssets":"Array of erc20 bAsset addresses","_hasTransferFees":"Bool signifying if this bAsset has xfer fees","_integrators":"Matching array of the platform intergations for bAssets","_mAsset":"Address of the mAsset whose Basket to manage","_weights":"Weightings of each bAsset, summing to 1e18"}},"negateIsolation(address)":{"details":"Negates the isolation of a given bAsset","params":{"_bAsset":"Address of the bAsset"}},"prepareForgeBassets(address[],uint256[],bool)":{"details":"Prepare given bAsset addresses for Forging. Currently returns integrator      and essential minting info for each bAsset","params":{"_bAssets":"Array of bAsset addresses with which to forge"},"returns":{"props":"    Struct of all relevant Forge information"}},"prepareRedeemMulti()":{"details":"Prepare given bAsset addresses for RedeemMulti. Currently returns integrator      and essential minting info for each bAsset","returns":{"props":"    Struct of all relevant Forge information"}},"prepareSwapBassets(address,address,bool)":{"details":"Prepare given bAssets for swapping","params":{"_input":"Address of the input bAsset","_isMint":"Is this swap actually a mint? i.e. output == address(mAsset)","_output":"Address of the output bAsset"},"returns":{"_0":"props     Struct of all relevant Forge information"}},"removeBasset(address)":{"details":"Removes a specific Asset from the Basket, given that its target/collateral      level is already 0, throws if invalid.","params":{"_assetToRemove":"The asset to remove from the basket"}},"setBasketWeights(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"External call for the governor to set weightings of all bAssets","params":{"_bAssets":"Array of bAsset addresses","_weights":"Array of bAsset weights - summing 100% where 100% == 1e18"}},"setTransferFeesFlag(address,bool)":{"details":"Update transfer fee flag for a given bAsset, should it change its fee practice","params":{"_bAsset":"bAsset address","_flag":"Charge transfer fee when its set to 'true', otherwise 'false'"}}},"title":"BasketManager","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"prepareForgeBasset(address,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Prepare given bAsset for Forging. Currently returns integrator      and essential minting info. _bAsset    Address of the bAsset props     Struct of all relevant Forge information"}},"notice":"Manages the Basket composition for a particular mAsset. Feeds all required          basket data to the mAsset and is responsible for keeping accurate records. typeDescriptions.typeString: struct MassetStructs.Basset storage ref[] storage ref

documentation.text:
@dev Marks a bAsset as permanently deviated from peg
 @param _bAsset Address of the bAsset

addBasset(address,address,bool).details: External func to allow the Governor to conduct add operations on the Basket

params._bAsset: Address of the ERC20 token to add to the Basket
params._integration: Address of the vault integration to deposit and withdraw
params._isTransferFeeCharged: Bool - are transfer fees charged on this bAsset

returns.index: Position of the bAsset in the Basket

collectInterest().details: Called by mAsset to calculate how much interest has been generated in the basket      and withdraw it. Cycles through the connected platforms to check the balances.

returns.interestCollected: Total amount of interest collected, in mAsset terms

decreaseVaultBalance(uint8,address,uint2.details: Called by mAsset after redeeming tokens. Simply reduce the balance in the vault

decreaseVaultBalances(uint8[],address[],.details: Called by mAsset after redeeming tokens. Simply reduce the balance in the vault

failBasset(address).details: Marks a bAsset as permanently deviated from peg

getBasset(address).details: Get data for a specific bAsset, if it exists

getBassetIntegrator(address).details: Get current integrator for a specific bAsset, if it exists

getBassets().details: Get data for a all bAssets in basket

returns.len: Number of bAssets in the Basket

handlePegLoss(address,bool).details: Executes the Auto Redistribution event by isolating the bAsset from the Basket

params._bAsset: Address of the ERC20 token to isolate
params._belowPeg: Bool to describe whether the bAsset deviated below peg (t)                         or above (f)

returns.alreadyActioned: Bool to show whether a bAsset had already been actioned

increaseVaultBalance(uint8,address,uint2.details: Called by only mAsset, and only when the basket is healthy, to add units to      storage after they have been deposited into the vault

increaseVaultBalances(uint8[],address[],.details: Called by only mAsset, and only when the basket is healthy, to add units to      storage after they have been deposited into the vault

initialize(address,address[],address[],u.details: Initialization function for upgradable proxy contract.      This function should be called via Proxy just after contract deployment.

params._hasTransferFees: Bool signifying if this bAsset has xfer fees
params._integrators: Matching array of the platform intergations for bAssets
params._mAsset: Address of the mAsset whose Basket to manage
params._weights: Weightings of each bAsset, summing to 1e18

negateIsolation(address).details: Negates the isolation of a given bAsset

prepareForgeBassets(address[],uint256[],.details: Prepare given bAsset addresses for Forging. Currently returns integrator      and essential minting info for each bAsset

params._bAssets: Array of bAsset addresses with which to forge

returns.props: Struct of all relevant Forge information

prepareRedeemMulti().details: Prepare given bAsset addresses for RedeemMulti. Currently returns integrator      and essential minting info for each bAsset

returns.props: Struct of all relevant Forge information

params._isMint: Is this swap actually a mint? i.e. output == address(mAsset)

returns._0: props     Struct of all relevant Forge information

removeBasset(address).details: Removes a specific Asset from the Basket, given that its target/collateral      level is already 0, throws if invalid.

params._assetToRemove: The asset to remove from the basket

setBasketWeights(address[],uint256[]).details: External call for the governor to set weightings of all bAssets

params._weights: Array of bAsset weights - summing 100% where 100% == 1e18

setTransferFeesFlag(address,bool).details: Update transfer fee flag for a given bAsset, should it change its fee practice

params._flag: Charge transfer fee when its set to 'true', otherwise 'false'

prepareForgeBasset(address,uint256,bool).notice: Prepare given bAsset for Forging. Currently returns integrator      and essential minting info. _bAsset    Address of the bAsset props     Struct of all relevant Forge information

userdoc.notice: Manages the Basket composition for a particular mAsset. Feeds all required          basket data to the mAsset and is responsible for keeping accurate records.          BasketManager can also optimise lending pool integrations and perform          re-collateralisation on failed bAssets.
